CommandDefinition.Name: creatermiproxyinterface
CommandDefinition.Description: Creates the rmi interface for the given proxyName or for given roles and rights

Argument.Name: roles
Argument.Description: Roles used in interface if proxy does not exist

Argument.Name: rights
Argument.Description: Additional rights used in interface if proxy does not exist

Argument.Name: targetDirectory
Argument.Description: The directory within which the jar file is created

BoolOption.Name: s
BoolOption.Description: Show created interface only, no jar generation
